mapper.select: select a.no, a.title, b.name as userName, a.hit, date_format(a.reg_date, '%Y-%m-%d %h:%i:%s') as regDate, a.user_no as userNo, a.o_no as oNo, a.depth from board a, user b where a.user_no = b.no and (title like #{kwd} or contents like #{kwd}) order by g_no desc, o_no asc;
mapper.update: update board set title = '삭제된 게시물 입니다.', contents = '', status = 1 where no = #{no};
